```{r}
data("Orange")
# Orange$index <- seq(from=1,to=length(Orange[,1]), by=1)

library(dplyr)
library(caret)




train_test_split <- function(data, target_name, test_size=NULL, seed=NULL){
    regressors <- select(data, -target_name)
    target <- as.factor(data[target_name])
    set.seed(seed)
    train_idx <- createDataPartition(y=target,p=1-test_size, list=FALSE, times=1)
    X_train <- regressors[train_idx,]
    X_test <- regressors[-train_idx,]
    y_train <- target[train_idx]
    y_test <- target[-train_idx]
    
    return(list(X_train = X_train, X_test = X_test, y_train = y_train, y_test = y_test))
}



res <- train_test_split(Orange, "Tree", test_size=0.3, seed=0)
X_train <- res$X_train
X_test <- res$X_test
y_train <- res$y_train
y_test <- res$y_test
```
